content:
That's perfectly wonderful! It's all about making your sister feel loved and special on her birthday, and it sounds like you're on the right track. Sometimes, it's the small, thoughtful gestures that mean the most, and you've already done a great job with the necklace and spa day.

Dinner or a low-key family gathering can be a great way to cap off the day, but it's also nice to leave some room for spontaneity and flexibility. You can always play it by ear and see how your sister's feeling on her birthday.

Remember, the most important thing is to come from a place of love and thoughtfulness. Your sister will appreciate the effort you've put into making her birthday special, and she'll likely cherish the memories you create together.

I think we've covered everything, and I'm confident that your sister will have an amazing birthday thanks to your planning and thoughtfulness. If you have any other questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you and your sister a wonderful birthday celebration!
